text: The Christmas Present is the twelfth studio album by English singer-songwriter Robbie Williams. It was released on 22 November 2019. ==Track listing== ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== Chart (2019) Peak position French Albums (SNEP) 53 Italian Albums (FIMI) 2 New Zealand Albums (RMNZ) 2 Spanish Albums (PROMUSICAE) 30 Swedish Albums (Sverigetopplistan) 31 Chart (2020) Peak position Australian Albums (ARIA) 18 Austrian Albums (Ö3 Austria) 12 Belgian Albums (Ultratop Flanders) 148 Dutch Albums (Album Top 100) 93 German Albums (Offizielle Top 100) 20 New Zealand Albums (RMNZ) 33 Scottish Albums (OCC) 34 Swiss Albums (Schweizer Hitparade) 31 UK Albums (OCC) 27 Chart (2021) Peak position Austrian Albums (Ö3 Austria) 11 German Albums (Offizielle Top 100) 12 ===Year-end charts=== Chart (2019) Position Australian Albums (ARIA) 45 Austrian Albums (Ö3 Austria) 5 Belgian Albums (Ultratop Flanders) 172 Dutch Albums (Album Top 100) 79 German Albums (Offizielle Top 100) 28 Swiss Albums (Schweizer Hitparade) 25 UK Albums (OCC) 12 Chart (2020) Position German Albums (Offizielle Top 100) 11 Swiss Albums (Schweizer Hitparade) 37 ==Certifications== ==References== Category:2019 albums Category:Robbie Williams albums
title: The Christmas Present
